home.title: Co-operative library
home.Description1: Do your books get dusty in your library? BabelsBooks is a shared and collaborative library, where each user shares his books freely with everyone. Babelbooks lets you borrow books thourought the city and makes it easy to find new discoveries
home.Description2: With Babel Books, You represent the library, as well as all the other members of the community! Two choices are available: give your books or borrow others, you choose.
home.Description3: At Babelbooks, we believe that a green world is a good place to live. For this reason,We have partnership agreements with recycling companies. If a book gets too much dusty,It will be recycled.
home.Description4: More than 87,549 users and 20,879,780 books shared.
